name: Microgames Jam Pak
description:
This is the end result of the Gameboy Microgames Jam held in November of 2022. (https://itch.io/jam/gb-microgames-jam) The goal of the jam was to have everyone work on WarioWare-style microgames that would then be combined together into a single game.

Microgames Jam Pak is that game.

And you can view the source code here.

Huge thanks to everyone involved in the project:

  • Bownly - Jam host, Lead dev/designer, Microgame dev
  • Adrián JG  - Microgame dev
  • dovesam - Microgame dev
  • Teaaa - Microgame dev
  • osfh - Microgame dev
  • joaomakesgames - Microgame dev
  • Synchingfeeling - Microgame dev
  • bbbbbr - Microgame dev
  • Sloopygoop - Composed various audio tracks used by the engine and in multiple microgames 
  • Daniel Ivanescu - Worked on engine code and provided the lobby jingles 
  • *Reakin - Designed the 8x8 px font used in-game
  • *RoleMusic - Composed some original music that was used as a basis for a few microgames' backing tracks
  • *TipTopTomCat - Composed a track that was used in a couple of microgames
  • *DeerTears' GB Studio Community Assets repository - Provided some tracks used in both microgames and the lobby
  • *_luminel_ - Provided character art for the gameover screen
  • *Friend - Pixel artist for the original Gameboy cartridge art that was adapted for use in the game
  • *Everyone who has contributed to the GBDK/GBDK 2020 project

*Those marked with an asterisk created public domain or otherwise permissibly used assets, but were not personally involved in this project.
